Name: Undivided Heart
Title: Ganyu: Undivided Heart
Desc: First the arrow strikes, and then it turns to frost.
Source: Reward for inviting Ganyu to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Undivided Heart
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1101]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1101] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S11013]</color> once.
When your $[A1101], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S11013]</color>: If this Skill has been used before during this match, the $[K5] dealt to all opposing characters on standby is changed to 3.
(You must have $[A1101] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

K5.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>
K5.Desc: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.
